flowRoot.flowPara: Press the space bar to continue with the instructions

text.tspan: You are done with the task.
Press space bar once more to
In this demonstration you will do the Deary-Liewald task.
Next, you will read the instructions and then do two different blocks of
In the following task, you see four white
boxes on the screen. In one of them a
cross is presented. Press the corresponding
key (as explained below) as fast as possible.
Respond as fast as you can!
Press space bar when ready to start!
In the following task, you see one white
box on the screen. When a cross appears,
press the space bar as fast as possible.
You will have to do this multiple times, and
the time when the cross appears varies
First a few training trials to warm up
Respond as fast as you can!
Press space bar when ready to start!
Now comes the real test of your speed
Thus, there are 4 different possibilities and
This task will repeat itself multiple times.
You will never know in advance which
position the cross will appear at.
When starting, lay your fingers on the keys used,
